item.title: Building Hedgewars under OS X Yosemite
item.description: Ok, you considered to build Hedgewars by yourself. To be clear, I’m going to build 0.9.21 on 10.10 Yosemite on MacBook Pro with Retina. First of all, read official manual. After source code pull from Mercurial failed via hg command I considered downloading source on the Downloads page. As original HowTo says, you should build Ogg and Vorbis, but while Ogg build succeeded, Vorbis said it can’t resolve u_int16_t type and after some googling I’ve found it was a known issue and you should replace #include with #include under #elfif (defined(__APPLE__) && defined(__MACH__)) in file _ogg/ostypes.
